For Love or Money or Fame Money and Fame Possibly Never Forthcoming

251 words written on Sat, Dec 7 2002

Love

Why is love such a hard thing to obtain, such a hard thing to grab, a dandelion seed floating in the air, moving just out of reach with every stab into the empty atmosphere. We know of its value, we know all the clich√©s, we know what to say, we know we like it (a lot). But we can never grab it. As I look around at the world and wonder how we can treat each other this way, every day I live in a microcosm which shows me that I, above all, am unable to even attempt such a lofty goal, failing every day in my better intentions, instead succumbing to my own needs, desires, expectations, insecurities, inabilities.
